Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL EMPLOYEES

Title: Relates to the earnings limitation for retired police officers employed as school resource officers
Summary: Relates to the earnings limitations for retired police officers employed as school resource officers; $65,000 for the year 2020 and thereafter.
LawCode: Amd ยง212, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to annual earnings limitations for retired police officers employed as school resource officers
